title: [Melgorehn's Valley, Riverbank]
description: From here, you can see under the bridge that crosses the river.  Phosphorescent lichen covers the underside, and large spiderwebs hang from the corners.  You think you might see large, shiny eyes in one of the shadows, but when you look again they have disappeared.  Shaken, you continue through the grass.

From here, you can see under the bridge that crosses the river.  Moss covers the underside, and large spiderwebs hang from the corners.  You think you might see large, shiny eyes in one of the shadows, but when you look again they have disappeared.  Shaken, you continue through the grass.
